# translit-ed

> Aggregator of various Cyrillic transliteration methods for ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¾ ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¬ ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡° ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡³ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿.

Language-aware, standard-based transliteration library for Cyrillic scripts. Supports national standards and BGN/PCGN for accurate bidirectional conversion. Ideal for SEO-friendly URLs, data normalization, and recovery of original Cyrillic text from transliterated forms.

## Docs

- [README](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed#readme): Comprehensive guide on installation, usage, and supported standards.
- [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/translit-ed): Package registry page for versioning and dependency info.

## API

- [Core Functions](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed/blob/master/src/index.ts): Bidirectional functions for Belarusian, Bulgarian, Kazakh, Macedonian, Mongolian, Russian, Serbian, Ukrainian, and Uzbek.
- [Generic Unicode Mapping](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed/blob/master/src/generic/cyrillicToLatin.ts): Fallback transliteration using standard Unicode mappings.
- [Type Definitions](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed/blob/master/dist/translit-ed.d.ts): TypeScript declarations for all exported functions.

## Examples

- [Usage Samples](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed#%EF%B8%8F-examples): Practical code snippets demonstrating how to use the library for different languages.

## Optional

- [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md): History of changes and version updates.
- [ROADMAP](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/translit-ed/blob/master/ROADMAP.md): Planned features and future directions.
